publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-576 Hugh Henry: Scotland’s Law Officers—That the Parliament welcomes the comments of the First Minister confirming judicial independence in Scotland; supports his comments in relation to the Lord Advocate; congratulates the Lord Advocate on her decision to express her views to the Parliament on the collapse of the World’s End case, and reaffirms the need for Scotland’s law officers to respond to public concern and be subject to parliamentary scrutiny.
S3M-576 Scotland’s Law Officers (lodged on 28 September 2007) Michael McMahon*
S3M-576 Scotland’s Law Officers (lodged on 28 September 2007) Peter Peacock*, Bill Butler*, Elaine Murray*, Elaine Smith*, Marlyn Glen*, Des McNulty*
S3M-576 Scotland’s Law Officers (lodged on 28 September 2007) Dr Richard Simpson*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Helen Eadie*, Cathie Craigie*, Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-576 Scotland’s Law Officers (lodged on 28 September 2007) Malcolm Chisholm*, Angela Constance*, Jamie Stone*, Ken Macintosh*, John Park*, David Whitton*
S3M-576 Scotland’s Law Officers (lodged on 28 September 2007) Hugh O’Donnell*
